summary: Standalone, full sets of bonemold with new colors!
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys!  This is my first mod ever so go easy on me.  I was super excited to see the bonemold armor again so I decided I would play with it a little for training in mod making.  Now, these may be more than simple color adjustments but they are still pretty simple... for now.  

All sets are standalone and craftable in the Bonemold section so Dragonborn is obviously required.  I haven\'t changed any stats or craft requirements so don\'t worry about tracking down butterflies and daedric hearts.  Oh, and I made sure to take the time to get all the NIFs for inventory and such done so it isn\'t incomplete looking.  It is for both male and female.

Currently I have these colors:
Black
Black with red stitching (Dark brotherhood in mind)
Blue
Dark grey
Grey
Red

Future ideas:

Expanded color choices
Colors to match major keeps and factions
HD packages
Lighten up the Dark Grey so it isn\'t so close to the Black
Darken the Grey so it is closer to the Steel equipment
Glow maps for a couple (I won\'t go crazy though)
Make the cloth on the Red armor look less pink
Fix small issue with cloth alpha on blue and red
author: Churchtheartist
